title: CLI commands
description:
Implement ticker CLI using cobra.

cmd/ticker/main.go:
- Root command with version info

cmd/ticker/run.go:
- ticker run <epic-id> [flags]
- --max-iterations (default 50)
- --max-cost (default 20.00)
- --auto (auto-select ready epic)
- --checkpoint-interval (default 5)

cmd/ticker/resume.go:
- ticker resume <checkpoint-id>
- Load checkpoint and continue

cmd/ticker/checkpoints.go:
- ticker checkpoints - list available checkpoints

Output: Progress to stdout, errors to stderr.
Exit codes: 0 success, 1 max iterations, 2 eject, 3 blocked.

Verify: All commands work with --help.
closed_reason: Implemented ticker CLI: run command with --max-iterations, --max-cost, --checkpoint-interval, --auto flags; resume command to continue from checkpoint; checkpoints command to list saved checkpoints. Exit codes: 0 success, 1 max iterations, 2 eject, 3 blocked, 4 error.
